n,w=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
if sum(a)>w or sum(a)<-w or sum(a)+w<0 or sum(a)-w>0 or sum(a)==w:
    print(0)
else:
    print(w-abs(sum(a)))

import sys

n, w = map(int, input().split()) 
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

i = 0
j = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > w or a[i] < -w:
        sys.stdout.write(0)
        break
    j += a[i]
    if j > w or j < 0:
        sys.stdout.write(0)
        break

if i == n-1:
    sys.stdout.write(w-j+1)

        print(0)
        break
    j += a[i]
    if j > w or j < -w:
        print(0)
        break
if i == n-1:
    print(w-j+1)
from itertools import combinations

n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

i = j = 0

if max(a) > w or min(a) < -w:
    print(0)
else:
    for i in range(n):
        j += a[i]
        if j > w or j < 0:
            print(0)
            break

    if i == n-1:

        print(w-j+1)

n,w=map(int,input().split()) #input n and w
a=list(map(int,input().split())) #input a
if sum(a)>w or sum(a)<-w or sum(a)+w<0 or sum(a)-w>0: #if sum of a is greater than w or less than -w or sum of a plus w is less than 0 or sum of a minus w is greater than 0
    print(0) #print 0
else: #else
    print(w-abs(sum(a))) #print w minus the absolute value of sum of a
import sys

n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

i = 0
j = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > w or a[i] < -w or a[i] == 0:
        print(0)
        break
    j += a[i]
    if j > w:
        sys.exit()

if i == n-1:

    print(w-j+1)
